metadata.title: CVE-2016-6199 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: ObjectSocketWrapper.java in Gradle 2.12 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted serialized object.

notes.note: pfsmorigo> GUI was deprecated after version 4.0

criterions.comment: gradle package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.13-4').
